quicken-step.name: Quicken Step
quicken-step.damage: Target gains +15 ft. movement and +1 D20 on SPD rolls.
quicken-step.description: Compress the seconds around your legs. Each stride devours a distance that should take longer to cross.

hastened-reflexes.name: Hastened Reflexes
hastened-reflexes.damage: Target gains +2 D20 on defensive rolls.
hastened-reflexes.description: Accelerate your perception until the world moves like honey. Attacks that seemed unavoidable become leisurely to evade.

rapid-strike.name: Rapid Strike
rapid-strike.damage: Next attack costs 0 AP and gains +1 D20 to hit. Must be used within 1 round.
rapid-strike.description: Steal seconds from the future to deliver your blow before the present catches up.

blur-of-motion.name: Blur of Motion
blur-of-motion.damage: Caster gains +2 D20 on defensive rolls. Attacks against caster suffer -1 D20. Caster must move at least 10 ft. each turn to maintain the effect.
blur-of-motion.description: Move so quickly that your form smears across multiple positions at once. Enemies struggle to track where you truly are.

accelerated-recovery.name: Accelerated Recovery
accelerated-recovery.description: Speed the flow of time through wounded flesh. Hours of healing compress into heartbeats.

borrowed-seconds.name: Borrowed Seconds
borrowed-seconds.description: Target gains +3 AP on their current turn. Within the next hour, the target loses 2 AP next turn.

flurry-of-moments.name: Flurry of Moments
flurry-of-moments.description: Make 3 attacks with a single action. The opponent only has a chance to defend the initial hit. If hit by the first attack, damage is rolled three times.

temporal-overdrive.name: Temporal Overdrive
temporal-overdrive.description: Caster immediately takes an additional full turn (6 AP) after their current turn ends. All enemies have -2 D20 to defend against attacks made during this bonus turn. After the effect ends, the caster loses 4 AP on their next regular turn as time reasserts itself.

weighted-seconds.name: Weighted Seconds
weighted-seconds.description: Target loses 10 ft. movement and -1 D20 on SPD rolls.

stalling-grasp.name: Stalling Grasp
stalling-grasp.description: Target loses 2 AP on their next turn.

temporal-drag.name: Temporal Drag
temporal-drag.description: When an ally within 30 ft. is targeted by a ranged attack, grant them +2 D20 on their defensive roll.

thickened-air.name: Thickened Air
thickened-air.description: Create a 15 ft. radius zone. All enemies within lose 20 ft. movement and -1 D20 on attack rolls.

suspended-harm.name: Suspended Harm
suspended-harm.description: When you or an adjacent ally takes damage, delay that damage for 3 rounds. At the end of the duration, the damage applies. If healed above the delayed amount before then, reduce the delayed damage accordingly.

moments-hesitation.name: Moment's Hesitation
moments-hesitation.description: Target loses their next turn entirely. Enemies with more than 100 remaining HP may resist with a DET check (Difficulty 45)

temporal-prison.name: Temporal Prison
temporal-prison.description: Target is removed from combat for 1 minute (10 rounds) or until the caster dismisses the effect. Target cannot be harmed while imprisoned but also cannot act, move, or be targeted. Range: 30 ft.

echo-of-vigor.name: Echo of Vigor
echo-of-vigor.description: Restore HP or ST equal to damage or expenditure taken in the last round (max 24). Range: Self.
echo-of-vigor.healing: up to 2D12 (equal to damage taken in last round)

memory-trace.name: Memory Trace
memory-trace.description: See a vision of events that occurred in this location within the last 24 hours. Duration and clarity depend on KNW + AST check.

rewind-wound.name: Rewind Wound
rewind-wound.description: Heal 2D10 HP. If target received damage this round, heal an additional 1D10.
rewind-wound.healing: 2D10 (+1D10 if wound occurred in last round)

yesterdays-strength.name: Yesterday's Strength
yesterdays-strength.description: Gain +2 to all stat modifiers for 3 rounds.

chronal-recovery.name: Chronal Recovery
chronal-recovery.description: Summon a Past Echo (see Quick Reference) that acts on your turn.

summon-past-echo.name: Summon Past Echo
summon-past-echo.description: Reach back to a version of yourself and pull...poral ghost. They remember being you, and fight as you once did.
summon-past-echo.notes: See Past Echo stat block in Time school reference.

undo-injury.name: Undo Injury
undo-injury.description: Target heals 4D12 HP. Remove one of the following conditions: Burned, Bleeding, Poisoned, or Shocked.

temporal-regression.name: Temporal Regression
temporal-regression.description: Choose one: Restore – Return one willing target to their exact state (HP, ST, SY, conditions, position) from 2 rounds ago | Regress – Return one enemy to their position from 2 rounds ago and remove any buffs gained during that time. Damage dealt is not reversed

foreseen-dodge.name: Foreseen Dodge
foreseen-dodge.description: Reaction: Gain +3 D20 on a single defensive roll.

tomorrows-vigor.name: Tomorrow's Vigor
tomorrows-vigor.description: Gain +1 D20 on all rolls for 3 rounds. At the end of the duration, suffer -1 D20 on all rolls for 1 round as the debt comes due.

glimpse-ahead.name: Glimpse Ahead
glimpse-ahead.description: Ask the Game Runner one yes/no question about the immediate consequences of a specific action. The answer reflects the most likely outcome.

inevitable-strike.name: Inevitable Strike
inevitable-strike.description: The next attack automatically hits (no roll required). Damage roll is made normally. Target may not use abilities that trigger on being attacked.

borrow-from-tomorrow.name: Borrow from Tomorrow
borrow-from-tomorrow.description: Gain 3D12 temporary HP that lasts for 1 hour. When the effect ends, if any temporary HP remains, you lose that amount from your current HP

paradox-wound.name: Paradox Wound
paradox-wound.description: 4D10 + AST Modifier. Sanity damage. Target must make a DET check (Difficulty 35) or gain Confused condition for 2 rounds as their mind rejects the paradox.

future-echo.name: Future Echo
future-echo.description: Summon a Future Echo (see Quick Reference) that acts on your turn. Duration: 5 rounds or until destroyed. The Future Echo knows one piece of useful information about the current situation
future-echo.notes: See Future Echo stat block in Time school reference.

sealed-moment.name: Sealed Moment
sealed-moment.description: [Declare one of the following before any roll is made]| They will fall: Target's next defensive roll automatically fails. || We will endure: Target ally's next defensive roll automatically succeeds. || It will strike true: Target ally's next attack automatically hits and crits. The sealed moment must occur within 3 rounds or the Hours are wasted. |
